ops.action: Extract logical sections into separate component files under frontend/src/components/ to keep the main App.jsx focused on layout and routing
ops.title: Extract large JSX into separate component files
ops.trigger: When App.jsx or any single component file exceeds ~150 lines

ops.action: Add or update Makefile targets rather than running pipeline scripts directly; the Makefile serves as the orchestration layer for the data pipeline
ops.title: Use Makefile targets for pipeline orchestration
ops.trigger: When running pipeline steps or adding new pipeline stages

ops.action: Always include `set -euo pipefail` at the top of bash scripts and use proper error handling with trap statements
ops.title: Pipeline shell scripts use bash with set -euo pipefail
ops.trigger: When editing or creating shell scripts in the pipeline/ directory

ops.action: Use gdal2tiles.py or gdal_translate for raster tile generation; check that GDAL is available in the environment and handle missing dependencies gracefully
ops.title: Tile generation uses GDAL utilities
ops.trigger: When working on map tile generation or the 04_generate_tiles.sh script
